Title: Provides for the imposition of consecutive sentences for persons convicted of promoting (dangerous) prison contraband in the first degree
Summary: Provides for the presumption of consecutive sentences for persons convicted of promoting dangerous prison contraband in the first degree such as weapons, explosives and similar items capable of facilitating an escape or causing a disturbance.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to sentences for inmates found guilty of promoting dangerous contraband
